title: Spring onion and parsley houmous
ingredients: ['2 (400g) tins chickpeas, drained', '7 tablespoons tahini', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon lemon zest, minced', '2 cloves garlic', 'handful flat leaf parsley', '4 spring onions, chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
